special_text:
[+1]: Put two counters of your choice from among +1/+1, trample, and vigilance on up to one target creature [i](You can choose the same counter twice.)[/i]
[-2]: Draw a card for each different power among creatures you control.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.”
